title: (x) "Rogon Sportmanagement" business card sans - Interstate {Dan}
content:
[http://www.kreisform.de/images/project/157.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181345/http:/www.kreisform.de/images/project/157.jpg "http://www.kreisform.de/images/project/157.jpg")

Take a look at the link above. I know the text is hard to make out but can anyone ID the font used for the contact info.

Thanks in advance.

 [‹ (x) "In Good Company" poster type - ITC Serif Gothic {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181345/http:/typophile.com/node/19056 "Go to previous forum topic") [Big Green Egg typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181345/http:/typophile.com/node/19049 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elabdesigns

comments.content: Interstate, from Font Bureau, I think.

I’ve checked into that.. its looks similar but Interstate is missing the + symbol within the charater set. Plus the numbers appear to be slightly different.

Any other ideas or recommendations?
No, Dan was right about Interstate. What do you mean the + is missing? The typefaces have a full ASCII character set, including the +.
